TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ChangePasswordDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在可视化设计器中为 Web 服务器控件提供设计时支持。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在可视化设计器中，当您从源切换到设计视图时，将分析描述控件的标记源代码， 并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 切换回源视图时，会将设计时控件持久保存到标记源代码，并将其编辑到网页的标记中。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.

related.span: ASP.NET 控件设计器简介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 演练：为 Web 服务器控件创建基本控件设计器

[<System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当在 设计图面上创建关联控件或该控件的副本时，.NET Framework 在内部构造该类的新实例。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of that control on the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象的元素 是从类派生的 ，并由内部定义的 XML 编码常量字符串填充。The elements of the object are derived from the class and are populated from internally defined XML-encoded constant strings.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将关联控件的模式 （可以是副本）设置为实际控件的当前模式。The method sets the mode of the associated control, which can be a copy, to the current mode of the actual control. 接下来，它强制重新创建子控件，然后调用基方法来生成标记。Next, it forces the child controls to be recreated, and then calls the base method to generate the markup. 如果发生错误，则 调用 方法来生成占位符的标记。If an error occurs, the calls the method to generate the markup for a placeholder.

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法，因为它最终调用 控件或控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml(class System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionCollection regions) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml (regions As DesignerRegionCollection) As String

param.name: regions
param.span: 一个 ，其中已添加关联的控件的当前视图的定义。

span.span: A to which a definition of the current view of the associated control has been added.

summary.span: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联控件的标记，并填充设计器区域的集合。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time and populates a collection of designer regions.

returns.span: 一个 ，其中包含用于在设计时呈现 的标记。

span.span: A containing the markup used to render the at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用 方法来生成控件的设计时呈现的标记 。The method calls the method to generate the markup for the design-time rendering of the control. 它还将 对象添加到 `regions` 描述控件的当前视图的参数 。It also adds a object to the `regions` parameter that describes the current view of the control.

para.span: 如果重写 方法，请务必调用基方法，因为它最终调用 控件或控件的副本来生成标记。

span.span: If you override the method, be sure to call the base method, because it eventually calls on the control or a copy of the control to generate the markup.

summary.span: 获取关联控件的当前模板的持久形式。

span.span: Gets the persisted form of the current template of the associated control.

returns.span: ，其中包含关联的 的当前模板的持久形式。

span.span: A containing the persisted form of the current template of the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将控件的或属性) (的当前模板序列化 到其持久性窗体，该窗体是 标记文本的对象。The method serializes the current template (the or property) of the control to its persisted form, which is a object of markup text. 此保存形式由追加的序列化子控件组成。This persisted form consists of the serialized child controls appended together.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

param.name: e
param.span: 创建或呈现关联的控件时抛出的 异常。

span.span: The that was thrown while creating or rendering the associated control.

summary.span: 获取呈现为占位符的标记，该占位符中包含尝试在设计时创建或呈现关联的控件时产生的错误的有关信息。

span.span: Gets the markup that renders to a placeholder containing information about the error that occurred while attempting to create or render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 包含指定异常的有关信息的占位符的标记。

span.span: The markup for the placeholder that contains information about the specified exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 占位符包含类型和控件名称、错误消息以及 与参数相关联的属性 `e` 。The placeholder contains the type and control names, an error message, and the property that is associated with the `e` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void Initialize(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

span.span: A , which implements .

summary.span: 准备设计器，以查看、编辑和设计关联的组件。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当设计器宿主 准备好使用设计器呈现控件时，将调用方法 。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render the control. 方法及其基方法会配置属性并连接设计器操作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer. `component`参数是 与此设计器关联的控件，或指定的控件的副本 `component` 。The `component` parameter is the control that is associated with this designer, or a copy of the control specified by `component`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

param.name: properties
param.span: 实现添加的和隐藏的属性的 的集合。

span.span: A collection implementing the of the added and shadowed properties.

summary.span: 供设计器用于在“属性”网格的显示中移除属性或添加其他属性，或者隐藏关联控件的属性\*\*\*\*。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件设计器使用从方法派生的方法，使用 设计器实现的相应设计时属性隐藏各种控件属性，以及在 " **属性** " 网格中添加或删除属性。Control designers use methods derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 对于 控件， 方法将属性设置 为对于不适 `false` 用于模板的属性 (在定义用户模板时将其从 " **属性** " 网格) 中删除。For the control, the method sets the attribute to `false` for properties that do not apply to templates (removes them from the **Properties** grid) when a user template has been defined.

para.span: 重写 方法，以便在设计时属性集合中将属性添加到属性或更改属性的属性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 请确保在执行其他处理之前调用基方法。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool RenderOuterTable { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.RenderOuterTable : bool with get, set

summary.span: 指定 控件是否使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则。

span.span: Specifies whether the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules.

value.span: 如果该控件使用外部表容器来应用内联 CSS 样式规则，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the control uses an outer table container to apply inline CSS style rules; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在标记中使用外部表容器来应用内联样式规则。The control uses an outer table container to apply inline style rule in the markup. 您可以通过将此属性设置为 true 来删除外部表容器。You can remove the outer table container by setting this property to true. 删除外部表后，可以更灵活地将 CSS 规则应用于控件呈现的标记。Removing the outer table gives you greater flexibility in how you apply CSS rules to the markup that is rendered by the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(class System.Web.UI.Design.EditableDesignerRegion region, string content) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub SetEditableDesignerRegionContent (region As EditableDesignerRegion, content As String)
public: override void SetEditableDesignerRegionContent(System::Web::UI::Design::EditableDesignerRegion ^ region, System::String ^ content);

span.span: The to set content for.

param.name: content
param.span: ，包含一个持久性控件或模板。

span.span: A containing a persisted control or template.

summary.span: 设置关联控件的模板的值。

span.span: Sets the value of a template of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将设计器中的可编辑区域设置为由参数在其持久性形式中指定的控件或模板 `content` 。The method sets an editable region in a designer to a control or template that is specified in its persisted form by the `content` parameter.

summary.span: 获取与此设计器关联的控件的模板组成的模板组的集合。

value.span: ，其中为关联的 的每个模板包含一个元素。

span.span: A containing an element for each template in the associated .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性构造 对象，并使用基属性返回的集合填充该对象。The property constructs a object and populates it with the collection returned by the base property. 然后，它 为 关联控件 (和) 的每个模板添加一个对象 。It then adds a object for each of the templates ( and ) of the associated control.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected Overrides ReadOnly Property UsePreviewControl As Boolean
protected: virtual property bool UsePreviewControl { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，指示设计器是否应使用临时副本取代与设计器关联的实际控件来生成设计时标记。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control that is associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于 属性始终为 `true` ，因此设计器使用 包含关联控件的临时副本的控件 来生成设计时标记。Because the property is always `true`, the designer uses a control that contains a temporary copy of the associated control to generate the design-time markup. 控件不影响的任何持久性 。The control does not affect any persistence for the . 如果 已重写属性以返回 `false` ，则设计器将使用关联的 自身来生成设计时标记。If the property were overridden to return `false`, the designer would use the associated itself to generate the design-time markup.

para.span: 您可以重写 属性以返回 或根据控件是否用类级别对象标记来确定其值 。

span.span: You can override the property to return or to determine its value based on whether the control is marked with a class-level object.

para.span: 如果 未重写，则 对象将忽略 。

span.span: If the is not overridden, the object ignores the .
